address_2: Green Villas Road No. 5 (As per site)
planned_area_source: As per copy of gram panchayat plan
area_comments: As per the sale deed and gram panchayat plan, the built-up area is 2,100 sft (Ground Floor: 1,050 sft + First Floor: 1,050 sft). Planned area as per plan is 1,496 sft.
occupancy_comments: Based on the documents and inspection, the property is self-occupied by the owner.
construction_comments: The property is fully constructed and ready for occupation.
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Valuation initiation form, sale deed, property tax receipt, house plan/permission, electricity bill.
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house.
• Land area as per sale deed: 134 Sq. Yds or 1,206 sft.
• Built-up area as per sale deed: 2,100 sft (Ground Floor: 1,050 sft + First Floor: 1,050 sft).
• Property is fully constructed and self-occupied by the owner.
• The property is located in a well-developed residential area called Green Villas, Ameenpur, Sangareddy.
• There is a deviation between the planned and actual built-up area.
• No negative features were observed in the neighborhood; condition of surroundings is good.
• Amenities and additional features are not specified in documents.
• All details are based on information provided by HSBC and supporting documents.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 23 August 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] and the value of amenities as on 23 August 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
